question_sentence: Trials began this week for defendants accused of plotting a coup to overthrow the government of which country?
evidence: The alleged ringleader of the "Reichsbürger" plot is a 72-year-old property developer who descends from Germany's abolished aristocracy and goes by the name Heinrich XIII Prince Reuss.

question_sentence: Hunter Biden is threatening legal action against which news channel?
evidence: A letter from Hunter Biden's legal team was made public on Monday, saying he plans to sue Fox News for defamation and for violating "revenge porn" laws. The US president's son also demands that the photos be removed from its platforms.

question_sentence: London rents have risen to a record level of how much per month on average?
evidence: New renters outside London will pay a less eye-watering £1,291, according to Rightmove. Soaring rents are being blamed on demand for housing outstripping supply, as well as landlords passing on increased costs to their tenants.

question_sentence: Students were suspended after ignoring orders to leave a pro-Palestinian encampment at which US university?
evidence: Dozens of students from Columbia University in New York are facing suspension after protesters seized Columbia’s Hamilton Hall on Tuesday. The university said it has begun its next phase of efforts to "ensure safety" on campus and to curtail the "noisy distraction" as students prepare for exams.

question_sentence: More than 15,000 esports fans flocked to the ESL One Birmingham tournament on Sunday to watch professional gamers battle for supremacy in which video game?
evidence: The winning team walked away with a $300,000 (£240,000) cash prize for their mastery of the multiplayer game, whose complexity has earned it comparisons to chess – if chess included fantasy characters battling in a primeval forest.

question_sentence: Elon Musk is rolling out Tesla’s "full self-driving" software in which Asian nation?
evidence: During a surprise trip to Beijing, Tesla CEO Elon Musk received approval to roll out the new software. But US regulators revealed last week that a two-year investigation uncovered 75 crashes and one death related to "full self-driving" (FSD), along with 467 crashes and 13 deaths from its less sophisticated iteration, "autopilot".

question_sentence: The newly revealed line-up for this summer's BBC Proms includes an evening dedicated to which non-classical genre?
evidence: "Prom 2: Everybody Dance! The Sound of Disco" will celebrate the 1970s floor-fillers of New York's nightclubs. It is one of several non-classical concerts designed to broaden the appeal of this year's Proms.

question_sentence: Donald Trump met privately on Sunday with which previous Republican presidential rival?
evidence: Trump and the Florida governor DeSantis held a private three-hour meeting described as "friendly". DeSantis requested the meeting, which was seen as a way for the two men to make peace and perhaps pave the way for future political collaborations.

question_sentence: Which singer faced a backlash for asking on social media whether Melissa McCarthy had used weight-loss drug Ozempic?
evidence: "Omg somebody please teach Barbra Streisand how to send a DM" one horrified fan wrote on X after seeing her tactless reply to McCarthy's post. Streisand swiftly deleted the comment, and later explained she 'forgot the world is reading'. Learn more about the politics of Ozempic on this week's episode of The Week Unwrapped.

question_sentence: Joe Biden is on the cusp of approving a US reclassification of cannabis from a Schedule I drug to what?
evidence: President Biden will reclassify marijuana from a Schedule I drug, alongside heroin and other hard drugs, to a Schedule III. This move will place cannabis alongside co-codamol and Tylenol with codeine, and other drugs determined to have medical applications.

question_sentence: Which California university deployed a heavy police presence to campus this week following violent clashes between protesters?
evidence: Authorities cleared an encampment on UCLA's campus and fired what appeared to be rubber bullets at protesters. The police action comes amid a wave of pro-Palestinian campus protests rippling across US universities.

question_sentence: Which state did Vice President Kamala Harris visit this week to campaign on the issue of reproductive rights?
evidence: Harris traveled to Florida on Wednesday, just hours after a controversial six-week abortion ban went into effect in the state. She blamed former President Donald Trump for the Supreme Court’s historic overturning of Roe v. Wade in 2022 and for a slew of abortion bans that several states have adopted since.

question_sentence: What household bill will soon become more expensive for millions of Americans?
evidence: Tens of millions of Americans could see skyrocketing internet bills this spring or could be abruptly kicked off their service plans as funding for the Affordable Connectivity Program (ACP) runs out. This program provides monthly discounts on internet service to low-income households.

question_sentence: Which airport says it has not lost a single piece of baggage in 30 years?
evidence: Japan’s Kansai International Airport says it has a spotless baggage record since opening in 1994. The airport averages 20-30 million passengers per year.

question_sentence: How much was former President Donald Trump fined Tuesday for violating his gag order in the New York hush money trial?
evidence: A judge fined Trump $9,000 for multiple violations Tuesday, including targeting witnesses and jurors on social media as his hush money trial plays out. Experts say the former president could face more fines in the coming days or possibly even 30 days in jail if the judge finds him in contempt.

question_sentence: Which food was linked to a multistate e.coli outbreak this week?
evidence: The CDC issued a warning about an e.coli outbreak tied to walnuts. More than a dozen people from two states have gotten sick, the agency said.

question_sentence: Which award show recently announced its 2024 nominees?
evidence: The nominees for the 2024 Tony Awards, which honor the best on Broadway, were revealed this week.

question_sentence: Which substance does the Biden administration plan to reschedule as a lower-risk drug?
evidence: The Biden administration moved Tuesday to reclassify marijuana as a lower-risk substance — a move hailed by lawmakers on both sides of the aisle that acknowledges the medical benefits of the long-criminalized drug.

question_sentence: What is the most climate-polluting fossil fuel worldwide?
evidence: Coal — the most climate-polluting fossil fuel — has been highly controversial at international climate talks. This week, the world’s most advanced economies agreed to shut down all their coal plants by 2035 at the latest.

question_sentence: Which country is being impacted by volcanic eruptions that have forced thousands to evacuate?
evidence: Renewed eruptions from a remote Indonesian volcano have triggered fresh evacuation orders and sparked flight cancellations this week with smoke, lava and volcanic gasses spewing out of the fiery mountain.

question_sentence: What is the future of the Constitution Yards beer garden after 2024?
choices: It will continue to operate at its current location.
It will relocate to a new location.
It will be converted into a luxury apartment building.

question_sentence: What happened in the Barrett Farm development in Magnolia?
What was the main purpose of the rally led by Rev. Al Sharpton in Wilmington, Delaware?
choices: To boost voter engagement within Delaware’s Black community to help reform the state’s legal system
To protest against the governor’s policies
To support a particular political candidate in the upcoming elections
To celebrate the diversity of Delaware’s Supreme Court

question_sentence: What is unique about the new Grotto Pizza location in Dewey Beach?
choices: It is the first Grotto Pizza location.
It is the largest Grotto Pizza location.
It features a new design that will be used in future sites.
It is the only Grotto Pizza location with a sports bar.

question_sentence: Which team won the Northern Delaware 4x400 at the 2024 Penn Relays?
What is the incentive for donating at least $25 to the Biden Victory Fund?
choices: A chance to meet the President and Dr. Biden in Washington, D.C.
A chance to meet the President and Dr. Biden in Rehoboth Beach, Delaware.
A chance to have dinner with the President and Dr. Biden.
A chance to attend a presidential reelection campaign.

question_sentence: Who won the Smyrna Town Council races in District 3 and the at-large race respectively, as reported on May 1, 2024?
What is the proposed use for the former Diamond State Drive-In site near Felton, Delaware?
What is a unique feature of Spark Golf compared to traditional golf clubs?
choices: Spark Golf only charges players for the rounds they play.
Spark Golf requires an upfront membership fee.
Spark Golf players must play in every round.
Spark Golf does not allow players to join multiple leagues.

question_sentence: What is the focus of the new exhibit at the Lewes History Museum?
choices: The legacy of the Daisey Family
The history and legacy of the Black community in Lewes
The history of segregation in the United States
